basics.name: Ian James Goodwin
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm an enthusiastic, ambitious, creative, expressive and an innovative software developer. I like a challenge and clear goals. Normally I'm positive, easy-going and informal and I like to give my opinion and participate. I consider myself a skilled at writing well-designed, testable and efficient code using current best practices in Web development. A fast learner, hard worker and team player who is proficient in an array of scripting languages and multimedia Web tools, I am experienced in full project life cycle from design to implementation to integration. I am driven by a passion for making great looking, powerful, and easy to use applications that work cross-browser and cross-platform. I aim to be a part of a high performance team developing software which gives the user an experience which is productive, meaningful, and enjoyable.

work.summary: Maintainance and development of new features for Only's webshop as well as development of internal tools for the team
highlights: Automated internal tasks which were once done manually, such as categorization of new styles for the shop
Redesign and coding for the shop including the homepage, product listing page and product detail page
A/B tested multiple components to improve basket size by 58 kr per transaction
Coding / development of in house tools for product enrichment
Code review of pull requests for other developers in Bestseller
Examining trends on the shop through tracking and A/B tests

work.summary: Development / programming on the browser based SPA Integrated Workflow Solutions, which provides realtime patient flow management for hospitals around the world
highlights: Coding / development of new features
Finding and fixing bugs
Writing unit tests
Tech lead on specific projects
Documentation / specification for new features
Feature development time estimation and task breakdown into Jira tickets
Development and maintenance of styleguide
Maintenance and responsibility for continuous integration system
Participation in daily standups as part of the agile workflow

work.summary: Design and development for the web shop veromoda.dk
highlights: Primary development responsibility for the internationally recognized Bestseller brand across European markets
Creating seasonal campaign pages including single page applications, landing pages, product display templates
Design and development of responsive email marketing templates
Developing systems for easy updates and maintenance of campaigns using spreed sheets and scripts using XML
Responsive layout development for tablets and mobile
Google analytics implementation and analysis
Close collaboration with graphic designers and project planners, photographers and writers
Integrating and aligning social media such as Facebook, Pinterest and Twitter with the web shop using APIs
Testing and documentation

work.summary: Design, code and maintain websites for businesses in a wide-range of industries.
highlights: Designing and developing websites using CMS, PHP, HTML5, CSS3, & javascript.
Making the websites responsive for tablet and mobile devices
Researching and implementing templates for the further design
Customizing templates using PHP
Database administration for content using MySQL
Communicate remotely with clients via email, skype meetings, and through project management tools such as BaseCamp
Documentation of my work for easy handover to other developers

work.summary: Develop and manage the worlds largest online library of architecture of over 75,000 images
highlights: Photo editing in Adobe Photoshop
Database management using Python and PostgreSQL
Frontend development for web application in HTML and JavaScript
Video production and web streaming

work.summary: Video production specialist for a variety of business in the silicon valley area
highlights: Non-linear video editing
Graphic design in Adobe Photoshop
Animation design and development in Adobe After Effects and 3d Studio Max
On site video production
Editing video with the client present
Web streaming for video

testimonials.name: Jens Gram
testimonials.testimony: Ian has been a valuable contributor to our AngularJS SPA; performing bug fixing, maintenance work, and developing new features according to solution descriptions. Furthermore, he's able to collaborate with everyone in an open and constructive manner (e.g., while reviewing pull requests from peers which is an important part of a normal workday). Ian’s intuitive feel for the wellbeing of colleagues as well as his attention to his work environment sets him apart from your regular developer. All in all, Ian comes with my warmest recommendations.

testimonials.name: Ronnie Trøjborg
testimonials.testimony: He has been a valuable asset to our team working as a software developer in our Aarhus office. He is both very bright and very motivated to always ensure that the solution has a solid foundation.Throughout his time at our office Ian has proven to be both loyal and hardworking. Based on our experience together, I can confidently recommend Ian without any hesitation. I am positive that he will become a productive member of any development team that he ends up at.

testimonials.name: Tina Lomholdt Jensen
testimonials.testimony: Ian is determined and good at helping his colleagues when needed. He takes care of his duties and is a dedicated employee.

testimonials.name: Jim Bain
testimonials.testimony: Ian has repeatedly demonstrated the ability to master this complexity with very little guidance. Ianʼs ingenuity and ability to learn on his own will be the cornerstones to a successful technology career.

testimonials.name: Josh Englander
testimonials.testimony: Ian has always performed his responsibilities with professionalism and timeliness. He has repeatedly gone beyond expectations.

testimonials.name: Eric Thiermann
testimonials.testimony: He is exceptionally talented, focused, and congenial to work with, and I credit him with spearheading many of the best works produced for my company during that time period.
